creator: jmelzer@web.de
text:
in the class AbstractCvsTask the line
    Using cvs passfile: 
is printed as MSG_INFO.

It is very irritating when you call cvs very often.

Can you change it please?

creator: stevel@apache.org
text: I'm willing to downgrade this to -verbose. What do others think?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: the commit is http://svn.eu.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=421590 which went into Ant 1.7.0, so it should really be set to FIXED.
